newsitem.title: FRANCE: Cubana to increase ex-Paris cargo rates.
newsitem.headline: Cubana to increase ex-Paris cargo rates.

text.p: Cubana is to increase its ex-Paris cargo rates by 50 centimes/kilo, effective March 1, the Cuban state airline's French GSA, Aero Cargo International, told Reuters.
"Cubana has not applied the fuel surcharge so there is scope for rate increases which will work out at around 3.5 percent," an Aero Cargo official said.
Cubana operates three weekly passenger flights between Paris/Orly and Havana using a five pallet capacity DC10 aircraft.
- Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+5017
